title: Leading source countries of DDoS attack traffic 2018
summary: The United_States was the world 's DDoS source countries Percentage by a distance in 2018 , with a attack of 30 percentage traffic .
To give this figure some context , China was second in the ranking valued at 16 percentage traffic , substantially lower in attack than that of the United_States .
Many of the world 's DDoS source come from the United_States .
gold: The statistic shows the percentage of worldwide denial of service attack traffic between November 2017 and April 2018 , sorted by originating countries . During that period of time , 30 percent of DDoS attack traffic originated from IP addresses in the United States .
